quote: I don't need you by my side. But I want you there. Very much want you there. That, I think, saysmore. Means more.""He took the hand she held out to him. ""We'll go down. James should be here soon
quote_letters: I DONT NEED YOU BY MY SIDE BUT I WANT YOU THERE VERY MUCH WANT YOU THERE THAT I THINK SAYSMORE MEANS MOREHE TOOK THE HAND SHE HELD OUT TO HIM WELL GO DOWN JAMES SHOULD BE HERE SOON
